Use this PDF, refer to it, understand what it is so that we can build upon this as you take future classes and know what the glyphs are, why they exist, how they came about, and how to identify them in your chart.
As always, I will see y’all on the next one. Vibe higher."

XIII. APP DEVELOPMENT SPECIFICATIONS
A. Foundational Requirements
1. Energy-Based System (Not Definition-Based):
                                                                                                            * No planet-in-house definitions
                                                                                                            * All readings must follow PHSR methodology
                                                                                                            * Display energy manifestation spectrum (lowest to highest vibration)
                                                                                                            * Emphasize transmutation capability
2. Astronomical Accuracy:
                                                                                                            * Use actual planetary positions, sizes, velocities
                                                                                                            * Calculate based on Astronomical Doctrine of Signatures
                                                                                                            * Implement Whole Signs house system exclusively
                                                                                                            * Dual wheel chart display (inner = houses, outer = signs)
3. Planetary Classification Display:
                                                                                                            * Tier 1: Ultrapersonal (☉☽)
                                                                                                            * Tier 2: Personal Inferior/Superior (☿♀)
                                                                                                            * Tier 3: Extrapersonal (♂)
                                                                                                            * Tier 4: Transpersonal (♃♄)
                                                                                                            * Tier 5: Metapersonal (♅♆♇)
4. Natural Rulership = True Placements:
                                                                                                            * 1st house = Aries energy (regardless of sign on cusp)
                                                                                                            * 2nd house = Taurus energy
                                                                                                            * Continue through all 12
                                                                                                            * Display both natural rulership AND outer wheel sign
________________


B. PHSR Implementation
Reading Order Enforcement:
                                                                                                            1. Planet: What is the focus?
                                                                                                            2. House: What field/area of life?
                                                                                                            3. Sign: What tone/expression?
                                                                                                            4. Ruler: Which planet governs the sign? (Chase ruler recursively)
UI Flow:
                                                                                                            * User selects planet
                                                                                                            * App highlights house location
                                                                                                            * Shows sign on outer wheel
                                                                                                            * Displays ruler
                                                                                                            * Option to “Chase Ruler” → repeats PHSR for that planet
                                                                                                            * Continue chain until user stops
________________


C. Seven-Aspect System
Must Include:
                                                                                                            * Conjunction (0°) - Together
                                                                                                            * Semi-Sextile (30°) - Hard Stop
                                                                                                            * Sextile (60°) - Companion
                                                                                                            * Square (90°) - Conflict/Growth
                                                                                                            * Trine (120°) - Direct Effect (not always easy)
                                                                                                            * Quincunx (150°) - Toggle (one or other, not both)
                                                                                                            * Opposition (180°) - Counterbalance (not middle ground)
Orb Verification:
                                                                                                            * Each planet has unique orb (Sun: 10°, Moon: 3°, others TBD)
                                                                                                            * Aspect only valid if within combined orbs
                                                                                                            * Display orb strength indicator
________________


D. Glyph Education Module
Include for Each Glyph:
                                                                                                            * Visual symbol
                                                                                                            * Historical origin
                                                                                                            * Why this shape (astronomical/mythological basis)
                                                                                                            * How to identify in chart
                                                                                                            * Memorization aids
Glyphs to Master:
                                                                                                            * 10 planets
                                                                                                            * 12 zodiac signs
                                                                                                            * 7 aspect symbols
                                                                                                            * 4 angles
                                                                                                            * 4 self-growth points
________________


E. Four Vitality Anchors
Ascendant:
                                                                                                            * Always 1st house
                                                                                                            * Keyword: Emergence (why you show up)
                                                                                                            * NOT mask (that’s 1st house itself)
Descendant:
                                                                                                            * Always 7th house
                                                                                                            * Keyword: Submergence (who you bring into private life)
                                                                                                            * NOT partner (that’s 7th house itself)
Midheaven:
                                                                                                            * Can float 8th-11th house (location-dependent)
                                                                                                            * Keyword: Peak Aspiration
                                                                                                            * Highest public visibility
Subheaven:
                                                                                                            * Opposite Midheaven, below horizon
                                                                                                            * Keyword: Core Anchor
                                                                                                            * What grounds you (NOT 4th house themes necessarily)
________________


F. Self-Growth Point Module
North Node ☊:
                                                                                                            * Future emotional trajectory
                                                                                                            * Never fully reached
                                                                                                            * Orb: 3° (moon-derived)
                                                                                                            * Relationship with mother you wish you had
South Node ☋:
                                                                                                            * Past patterns, default settings
                                                                                                            * Comfort zone, skills, habits
                                                                                                            * Orb: 3° (moon-derived)
                                                                                                            * Actual relationship with mother/family
Chiron ⚷:
                                                                                                            * Authenticity wound
                                                                                                            * Where “normal” doesn’t work
                                                                                                            * Orb: 0.5°-1.5° (still being refined)
                                                                                                            * Gift when embraced
Black Moon Lilith ⚸:
                                                                                                            * Raw emotional truth
                                                                                                            * Guilt and shame point
                                                                                                            * Orb: 3° (moon-derived)
                                                                                                            * Use Mean version (inward focus)
________________


G. Educational Features
1. Unlearning Module:
                                                                                                            * Identify common misconceptions from traditional astrology
                                                                                                            * Explain why they’re incorrect
                                                                                                            * Provide Alchemystic correction
Examples:
                                                                                                            * “Mars in 7th ≠ aggressive to partner” → Show PHSR variations
                                                                                                            * “Trines are good” → Explain direct effect isn’t always beneficial
                                                                                                            * “Generational planets” → Correct to Metapersonal
2. Astronomical Education:
                                                                                                            * Why planet order matters
                                                                                                            * How Earth’s axial tilt creates zodiac
                                                                                                            * Ecliptic explanation with visuals
                                                                                                            * Sidereal rotation vs revolution
                                                                                                            * Obliquity and declination
3. Interactive Glyph Quiz:
                                                                                                            * Flash cards for memorization
                                                                                                            * Chart identification practice
                                                                                                            * Timed recognition tests
________________


H. Chart Display Requirements
Dual Wheel:
                                                                                                            * Inner: Houses (Earth’s rotation)
                                                                                                            * Outer: Signs (Universe/Ecliptic)
                                                                                                            * Center: Earth symbol
                                                                                                            * Static natal vs rotating transit layer
Color Coding:
                                                                                                            * Inner wheel: One color family
                                                                                                            * Outer wheel: Different color family
                                                                                                            * Transits: Third color (overlaying outer)
                                                                                                            * Emphasize “membrane” between wheels
Information Hierarchy:
                                                                                                            * Houses MORE prominent than signs (correcting traditional priority)
                                                                                                            * Planets sized by orb influence?
                                                                                                            * Aspect lines color-coded by type
________________


I. Transmutation Tools
For Each Placement, Offer:
                                                                                                            * Lowest vibration manifestation
                                                                                                            * Middle vibration options
                                                                                                            * Highest vibration potential
                                                                                                            * Concrete transmutation steps
                                                                                                            * Real-world examples
Example:
 Mars in 7th through Taurus (Scorpio Rising):
                                                                                                            * Lowest: Projecting service/criticism onto partner
                                                                                                            * Middle: Healthy boundaries around mutual support
                                                                                                            * Highest: Action-oriented partnership serving shared values
                                                                                                            * Steps: Recognize projection → Own 6th house energy → Direct into partnership consciously
________________


J. User Onboarding Flow
1. Philosophy Introduction:
                                                                                                            * Energy vs definitions
                                                                                                            * Free will vs fate
                                                                                                            * Alchemy explanation
                                                                                                            * Why astronomy matters
2. Glyph Training:
                                                                                                            * Must pass recognition test before chart access
                                                                                                            * Spaced repetition system
                                                                                                            * Track mastery level
3. PHSR Tutorial:
                                                                                                            * Interactive walkthrough
                                                                                                            * Practice with sample placements
                                                                                                            * Verify understanding before full chart
4. Chart Exploration:
                                                                                                            * Guided tour of own chart
                                                                                                            * Highlights ultrapersonal planets first
                                                                                                            * Introduces complexity gradually
________________


K. Advanced Features (Post-Basics)
1. Rulership Chains:
                                                                                                            * Visual mapping of PHSR chains
                                                                                                            * Show where chains converge
                                                                                                            * Identify “power planets” (many rulers point here)
2. Aspect Grid:
                                                                                                            * Matrix showing all planet-to-planet relationships
                                                                                                            * Orb strength indicators
                                                                                                            * Filter by aspect type
3. Transit Tracking:
                                                                                                            * Show current transits through outer wheel
                                                                                                            * Highlight which houses being activated
                                                                                                            * Membrane visualization (energy passing through sign to reach house)
4. Relocation Charts:
                                                                                                            * Compare natal to relocated
                                                                                                            * Show how angles shift
                                                                                                            * Explain implications
5. True Placements:
                                                                                                            * Automatically translate chart to natural rulership
                                                                                                            * “You’re not Sagittarius Rising, you’re Aries” explanation
                                                                                                            * Show difference between traditional and alchemystic interpretation
________________


L. Quality Standards
Must NOT Include:
                                                                                                            * Cookbook definitions
                                                                                                            * “Mars in 7th means X” statements
                                                                                                            * Any fatalistic language
                                                                                                            * Placidus or other house systems
                                                                                                            * Five-aspect system
                                                                                                            * Traditional IC/Nadir terminology
                                                                                                            * Generational planet language
Must ALWAYS Include:
                                                                                                            * PHSR context for every reading
                                                                                                            * Transmutation options
                                                                                                            * Astronomical basis explanations
                                                                                                            * Free will emphasis
                                                                                                            * Energy language (not definitions)
                                                                                                            * Seven-aspect system
                                                                                                            * Alchemystic terminology (Vitality Anchors, Subheaven, Metapersonal, etc.)
