TRANSCRIPT 17: TAMING & EMBRACING BLACK MOON LILITH WEBINAR
Harvard-Level Knowledge Extraction for Alchemistic Astrology App Development
Date: December 18, 2024
Topic: Black Moon Lilith - Repression, Authenticity, Radical Self-Acceptance
Word Count: ~24,000 words
Instructor: Logan (Alchemistic Astrology System)
________________


PART 1: INTRODUCTION AND WEBINAR PURPOSE
Opening Framework
The instructor opens the webinar with explicit emphasis: “Along with Chiron, I think this is one of the most important points in your chart.” Unlike Chiron (which focuses on wounds and healing), Lilith addresses repression, limitations, and suppression of authentic self-expression.
Core Problem Statement (Verbatim):
“It creates these limitations of keeping you down, keeping you repressed, keeping you from doing things that would be organically true to yourself. And when we don’t use it, or we ignore it, or we don’t understand it, or if we let it manifest in its normal, you know, what do you call it? Potential state rather than kinetic, which would be you interjecting your free will. When we let it manifest in its normal state, we don’t feel very connected to things that feel true to us, and we feel like we’re just kind of going through the motions of things.”
The webinar’s purpose is to:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 1. Correct widespread dismissal of Lilith in astrology
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 2. Provide technical astronomical grounding for calculation
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 3. Distinguish mean vs. osculating (true) Lilith and their different manifestations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 4. Map Lilith themes to real-life examples through participant charts
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 5. Establish “taming vs. embracing” methodology for integration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 6. Demonstrate app development specifications for ethical, accurate implementation
________________


PART 2: ASTRONOMICAL BACKGROUND AND TECHNICAL DEFINITIONS
Three Versions of Black Moon Lilith
The instructor identifies three main calculation methods, but only two are valid for Alchemistic Astrology:
1. Mean Black Moon Lilith:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Definition: “Mean means average, right? It doesn’t mean mean; however, it does mean mean. So, it’s the word M-E-A-N, because it’s the average.”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Calculation: Uses the “smooth route” of the Moon’s elliptical orbit around Earth, averaging out gravitational fluctuations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Astronomical Position: “Gives us a very non-specific but averaged out rounded point that is the average focal area of Lilith”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Interpretation: Internalized, consistent, thematic energy
2. Osculating (True) Black Moon Lilith:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Definition: “The other name for black moon Lilith osculating is true lunar apogee”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Calculation: Factors in gravitational pull from Earth, Sun, Jupiter, and Moon itself to account for the Moon’s actual non-uniform orbit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Astronomical Position: “Very precise positioning of where Lilith truly is; if you factor everything else”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Interpretation: External, acute, visceral, “no filter” reactions
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Software Code: H13 in Astro.com and Swiss Ephemeris
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Chart Symbol: LILO (when displayed in chart)
3. Interpolated Lilith (NOT RECOMMENDED):
“You have the Priapus, which is interpolated, and we have Lilith, which is interpolated. We don’t want either of these two because an interpolated Lilith or an interpreted Priapus… These two are basically averages between osculating and mean. And it’s, I haven’t found any validity for these, so I don’t use them.”
Astronomical Reality: The Lunar Apogee
Lilith is not a physical body but a geometric point in space:
Elliptical Orbit Mechanics:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * The Moon orbits Earth in an ellipse (not a circle)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Lunar Perigee: Closest point to Earth
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Lunar Apogee: Farthest point from Earth (this is Lilith)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Empty Focus: The second focal point of the ellipse (geometrically necessary but with no gravitational body)
The “Invisible Mirror” Concept:
“Now, alchemistic astrology, we call this the invisible mirror. The reason we do that is because this energy, this line, which is a geometric line, is a mathematical fixation. It’s not derived on the earth, but the moon does revolve around the earth. So when we calculate a point, geometrically speaking, off of the moon, we have to reflect it back onto the earth. But we’re coming from a place that is not earthly; it is not grounded. It has nothing to do with anything we’re trying to do in the world. It is something that is completely distanced from all mankind, all humanity, and all things that are earth-like.”
Key Distinction:
 Mean and osculating Lilith can be “almost 12 degrees away from each other” in the same chart, meaning they can occupy different houses and even different signs.
________________


PART 3: CORE PSYCHOLOGICAL THEMES
Primary Themes of Black Moon Lilith
1. Repression and Internalized Limitation:
“It creates these limitations of keeping you down, keeping you repressed, keeping you from doing things that would be organically true to yourself.”
2. Suppression of Authenticity:
 People feel they are “not allowed to do things that would be organically true,” leading to disconnection from their true self.
3. Shame and Guilt (Mean Lilith Specialty):
“Mean Lilith is an internalized, remember it’s an average of energies. So this energy is internal, it’s more consistent and it’s thematic. You feel it inside; other people don’t know anything about this one. Other people don’t know why you feel guilt, why you feel shame, why you feel isolated, why you feel like you can’t do certain things, why you feel like certain things are not allowed. They don’t know that; only you know this.”
4. Othering and Outcast Feelings:
“You’re going to feel othered. You’re going to feel outcasted in this area… if you actually pay attention to mean Lilith, nobody told you that you weren’t allowed to do this. Nobody said that. Nobody said you can’t do this. It’s just that when you express yourself in that way, you get a reaction from other people, and it’s not, sometimes it’s verbal, but it’s usually not. It’s usually a feeling.”
5. Radical Self-Acceptance as Solution:
“Lilith represents in both forms radical self-acceptance. The problem is that we are so trained and indoctrinated by social norms, conventional upbringing, all of these things that happen in the world, how other people do it, that nobody allows other people to be themselves. And the radical self-acceptance means true self. This is really you. Where’s your Lilith? That’s you.”
Mean vs. Osculating Lilith: Functional Differences
MEAN LILITH (Internalized):
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Experience: Consistent, thematic, internal
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Manifestation: Guilt, shame, “not allowed” feelings that others don’t see
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Social Dynamic: Self-imposed limitations based on perceived (not real) external judgment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Quote: “Other people are not making you feel that way; you’re making yourself feel that way.”
OSCULATING/TRUE LILITH (External/Visceral):
“Osculating Lilith, this is the one you feel the most and you don’t realize it… it is like it’s not Pluto, like rage boiling up from the under the surface. It’s like very quick, like FU energy that comes out… And it triggers that like raw, emotional, visceral response that feels like, ah, maybe I shouldn’t have said that kind of energy.”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Experience: Acute, snappy, “no filter zone”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Manifestation: Raw reactions, unfiltered responses, boundary-pushing behavior
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Social Dynamic: Immediate, visceral assertion that can shock or alienate others
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Warning: “Lilith can get you into trouble. However, there’s an unmatched and unparalleled… power in it.”
RETROGRADE OSCULATING LILITH:
“Oscillating retrograde Lilith is everything that osculating Lilith is, but redirected back on yourself, so instead of getting upset at other people, the frustration comes up, and then you redirect that back at yourself. I’m mad at myself. I should have done this. Why didn’t I do this? That’s what the retrograde comes in. That’s very difficult; however, what it does for you positively, it allows you to reflect on these things.”
Important: Mean Lilith cannot be retrograde—only osculating/true Lilith can have retrograde motion.
________________


PART 4: DISTINCTION FROM CHIRON
Chiron vs. Lilith: Core Differences
CHIRON (Accepting the Wound):
“Chiron makes us overcompensate so that we can prove we can do something and other people love us and accept us.”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Theme: Wounds and healing
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Approach: Seeking acceptance and validation
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Behavior: Compensation for perceived weakness
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Goal: Healing through acceptance
LILITH (Embracing the Raw Self):
“Lilith does it to kind of show the world that they’re wrong.”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Theme: Authenticity and repression
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Approach: Radical self-assertion
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Behavior: Affirming taboo or suppressed desires/needs
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Goal: Liberation through embracing the forbidden
Integration Point:
“In my opinion, along with Chiron, I think this is one of the most important points in your chart because it doesn’t share the exact thing; it really doesn’t share any of the themes of Chiron unless it’s linked to it. But it shares a very similar presence in your chart, I think, where it creates these limitations of keeping you down, keeping you repressed.”
Key Distinction:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Chiron calls for acceptance and healing
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Lilith demands taming and embracing the forbidden side
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * They only overlap thematically “when linked” (aspected together)
________________


PART 5: POTENTIAL STATE VS. KINETIC STATE FRAMEWORK
The Free Will Question
Potential State (Default/Unconscious):
“When we don’t use it, or we ignore it, or we don’t understand it, or if we let it manifest in its normal, you know, what do you call it? Potential state rather than kinetic, which would be you interjecting your free will. When we let it manifest in its normal state, we don’t feel very connected to things that feel true to us, and we feel like we’re just kind of going through the motions of things.”
Consequences of Potential State:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * End up in jobs you hate (“nine to fives we don’t want to be in”)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Stay in toxic relationships (“taking abuse from people”)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Don’t advocate for yourself
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Feel disconnected from authentic desires
Kinetic State (Active/Conscious):
“Unless you say, ‘No, I’m gonna stand in my power; I’m gonna exert my free will; I’m gonna work with you, planet, but I’m not gonna let you tell me what to do.’ If you don’t do that actively, then you’re human… you’re just a human that’s interacting and letting everything just kind of go and flow.”
The Illusion of Free Will
Instructor’s Philosophy (Verbatim):
“A lot of us think we have free will; we think we made choices. There is an illusion of free will that’s in there. A lot of times we think we’ve made choices. I always tell you, if I’m able to guess what you did by looking at your chart, you didn’t actually exert free will. Now, if you were able to do something different— and it does happen every once in a while— if you got a list telling plants, listen, bitch, are we doing this now? Yes, Tanya. If I’m doing a reading for you or someone else, another alchemistic astrologer is doing a reading and it’s within the same energy, but it’s not the expected outcome; that’s free will.”
Application to Lilith:
 True free will is measured by whether you act outside raw chart indicators—using planetary energy with intent rather than being directed by it or repressing it.
________________


PART 6: MYTHOLOGICAL FRAMEWORK AND SYMBOLISM
The Lilith Story (Hebrew/Babylonian Mythology)
Core Myth:
“Even if you take Lilith as a story, she was not subservient. Under no condition was she not going to be special or at least equal, because there’s an element of that as well. So she was like, instead of feeling oppressed, I’m going to feel liberated. I’ll go out and do my own thing. The problem with her, she went so far into that that if you follow the mythology a little too far, she gets crazy and becomes a nut job. And Lilith is our crazy. That’s the other thing.”
Mythological Themes:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 1. Refusal of submission (first woman, not subservient to Adam)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 2. Choice of exile over conformity
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 3. Self-assertion at the cost of belonging
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 4. Shadow side: Going too far into self-absorption or reaction
The Cage and Leash Metaphor
Core Teaching:
“I used to say a long time ago if you wanna use Lilith properly, you have to let her out of the cage, but not let her off of the leash. Now, if you let her off of the leash, you think about the moon being further away; there’s this moment in a pattern like this, in an elliptical orbit here, where you have to imagine if the moon had feelings and the moon was a person, and it was sitting there, and it had to keep going in orbit around as a satellite around the earth, and it’s getting to the furthest point. It’s like there’s this feeling of I could just let go right now. I could let go, and I could drift off into the ether of space, and I would have no responsibility. I would have no connection to anybody. I would have nothing that would require me to do anything…”
Interpretation:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Out of the cage: Don’t repress Lilith (leads to illness/shadow)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Not off the leash: Don’t indulge every impulse uncritically (leads to alienation/chaos)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Balance: Express authentically while maintaining connection to reality and others
Application:
“We have to make sure that we don’t go so far as to alienate all their people, alienate society, alienate ourselves from reality. We still have to find a way to use all of our energies and not Lilith by herself to do the things we need to do to take care of the things we need to take care of and to live a happy life that we want to live.”
________________


PART 7: INTERPRETATION METHODOLOGY
Step-by-Step Framework
1. Determine Both Positions:
 Use software to calculate both mean (average) and osculating (H13, true) Lilith positions.
2. Assess Degree Separation:
“For me, what this means is that how true Lilith expresses itself is going to be in one area of life, and how mean Lilith expresses itself is somewhat in the other area of life.”
When they’re far apart (different houses/signs), themes operate in separate life areas.
3. Determine Energy Flow Order:
“Now we know that at 29 degrees right here, this is in the fusion cusp area. So this actually blends from the fifth house into the sixth. When we talk about it, we’re going to talk about which one’s first, which one’s second. Remember, in alchemistic astrology, order of planets, the exact placement, the way the energy flows in terms of zodiacally, or, you know, whether it’s applying or separating, which one came first, which one has to be resolved, which one’s causing the friction; super important stuff…”
Lesser degree comes first and drives energy flow.
4. Check Retrograde Status:
 Only osculating Lilith can be retrograde. If retrograde, energy redirects inward (self-blame, self-reflection).
5. Examine Aspects:
 Check aspects to:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Vitality anchors: Ascendant, Descendant, Midheaven, IC/Subheaven
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Luminaries: Sun and Moon
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Nodes: North/South Node
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Chiron: Wound interplay
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Delegates: Ruling planets of houses
6. Consider Fusion Cusp:
 When Lilith straddles house boundaries (within 1-2 degrees of cusp), themes blend between both houses.
7. Maternal Connection:
“Remember all of these are also tied into mother as well. Uh-huh, so these elements of guilt and shame are things that you felt from your mother, um, where she didn’t necessarily understand you… and there would have been a feeling of abandonment, at least an emotional level from your mother, where you would have wanted to have this, or you would have wanted her to give you a much more deeper, intimate type of relationship.”
Shadow Work Guidance
The Reflection Challenge:
“So what we have to do to fix a lot of it is to say, how does this way I’m feeling apply back into my situation? That’s the challenge with both of them: to do the reflective work. So, Lilith is also the deeper shadow work, the stuff that makes us feel disconnected from the world in general, to understand why. But we don’t wanna get lost in shadow work. We don’t wanna get lost in understanding to a point where we feel like we’re fixing. We wanna get to a point where we say, how can we use, how can we take these feelings and these natural raw desires? How can we take them and reflect those back into our marriage, into our work, into our children and parenting, into our creative endeavors, our own business? How can we take this thing that’s so important to us and apply it back in.”
Key Principles:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 1. Don’t get lost in endless shadow work (avoiding over-analysis paralysis)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 2. Ask: How does this feeling apply back into my situation?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 3. Integrate: Reflect desires/needs back into practical life areas
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 4. Move from insight to action quickly
________________


PART 8: INSTRUCTOR’S PERSONAL LILITH PLACEMENT
Chart Details
Positions:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Mean and osculating Lilith approximately 12 degrees apart
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Spanning 5th to 6th house (fusion cusp area)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Both influenced by work, creativity, routine, criticism themes
Life Story Manifestations
1. Abandoning His Child:
“I ended up leaving my child, my oldest child, because I ended up leaving there. Now, my ex-wife was keeping my kid from me; I wasn’t seeing her, so I made the decision to go after something where I felt like I had purpose… I feel guilty; I feel shame because I abandoned my child; I haven’t been true to myself, and I would have felt the other way had I not been true to myself. I would have felt the same thing. This is how it’s gonna naturally manifest.”
Lilith Manifestation:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Guilt/shame around leaving (mean Lilith)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Visceral need for purpose overriding conventional expectations (osculating Lilith)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Catch-22: Would have felt guilt either way (staying or leaving)
Daughter’s Oracle Card Moment:
“I remember she held one up a couple of years ago… she held one up, it was an Oracle card, and it said, you have nothing to be guilty about. It was literally what the card said. And like, I broke down because…She looked at the card, she’s like, you have nothing. She doubled down on it, but I feel guilty.”
2. White Rapper Shame:
“I also felt guilty about the fact I was a white rapper… Back when I was doing music, there was only one and he just came out: Eminem had just come out. And this energy here, I went to a demo or an expo rather and had my demo with me… I remember Def Jam and Interscope. I remember getting there, and I walked up, and my music was nothing like his. But they turned it on… And I remember those two; I got like six seconds into them playing and said, we already have a white boy rapper, we don’t need you. And I actually felt bad about it; I felt like that was not— I wasn’t allowed… I, and I kind of just gave up on music in general, which is right here. Because I used to be relentless.”
Lilith Manifestation:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Internalized “not allowed” based on external rejection
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Abandonment of authentic passion (music)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Repression despite being “relentless” before
3. Hollywood Fetish Content Work:
“Fast forward to Hollywood. So I come out here, I live in my car for two years… At the time, I was doing stuff for… Pretty Little Liars… and was also a stand-in for… Steven Tyler. But I took this because I needed the money… I felt liberated because I had no rules, nobody governing me… I had no PGR, PG-13, no status; I had nothing that I had to do… but I felt shame for it at the time. I don’t anymore; I don’t care. But at the time, for a long time, I did care… So I tried to repress it and hide it and whatever. And the irony is that I had several film production company businesses, and the one that did that content was how I made all my money; the other stuff I did… I didn’t get paid for it, or I didn’t get any sort of recognition.”
Lilith Manifestation:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Liberation through breaking rules (osculating Lilith)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Shame about source of income (mean Lilith)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Financial success came from the repressed/taboo work
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Embracing it later led to business recovery
Success Story:
“Once I started embracing it, and I just said, screw it, especially after the night shadow stuff, that business had kind of like hit a dip 'cause we haven’t filmed anything in eight years. I embraced it, started advertising it again, and went right back up… So we went from something that was making millions down into six figures… back into the mid-high six figures on something I haven’t done in eight, coming up on nine years.”
4. Verizon Sales Job:
“I work for Verizon…there was something called a sales walk, and I said, no, I’m not doing that…My Lilith would come out very much like I just sounded. Get off my back, dude. And it would come out very visceral… We created this kind of system… when we were selling things, we would bring each other in on the sale… It made us a lot of money… That Lilith was like, I don’t really care if corporate doesn’t like it.”
Lilith Manifestation:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Visceral rejection of corporate structure (osculating Lilith)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Creating own system despite rules
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Success through rebellion
5. Criticism Compulsion:
“When I got into astrology, I wanted it to be practical. When I do anything, you guys have heard me say, when I got to Hollywood, first thing I said when I got onto set was, this is highly inefficient. That was the first thing I said. I loved it, loved it, but I criticize everything. Again, criticizing too much.”
Lilith Manifestation:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Compulsive need to criticize/improve (6th house Lilith)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Tension between loving something and needing to fix it
________________


PART 9: PARTICIPANT CHART READINGS (COMPLETE EXAMPLES)
PARTICIPANT A: JEN (Moon Conjunct Lilith)
Chart Details:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Conjunction between mean and true Lilith (three-degree orb)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Also conjunct the Moon
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Placement: 2nd and 6th house cusp
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Aries rising
Interpretation (Verbatim):
“Lilith here. The order here is true…means Lilith, then true Lilith… how you feel internally about something, and the shame and the guilt around motherhood, around family, around your upbringing, around your roots, around real estate… can make you feel like either I’m not a good mom, but I know that I’m supposed to be a mom.”
Live Feedback:
“I manage the department and everybody calls me the mother. That’s what’s funny, yeah.”
Additional Interpretation:
“So the flow for you is what ends up happening is like you’ll feel the guilt and shame first as it connects into your chart. You’ll feel that first when it comes to mental health; when it comes to your job, you feel that first. And because of the conjunction, it immediately stops you from doing anything else. You can’t truly feel things the way you want to. You never truly feel safe because what you needed to feel safe when it comes to your survival instincts, when it comes to accepting the things that are truly yours in your own way, your own, the details and whatnot, because Lilith comes first, and it’s such a hard energy to deal with, which is guilt and shame and all that kind of stuff. It feeds directly into the next, and you have this like immediate reaction. Like I feel guilty and shame, but damn it, I hate this kind of energy.”
Real-World Manifestation:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Work identity as “the mother”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Mortgages/banking (house/home themes)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Guilt around motherhood role
________________


PARTICIPANT B: PAMELA (3rd House Lilith Retrograde)
Chart Details:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Lilith at 2 degrees (very early placement)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Retrograde
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * 3rd house placement

“About your thoughts, your ideas, your communication; anything for you that wraps into details, obviously scheduling and planning things as well. Internal reaction is retrograde, like I said, it’s coming inward, it’s being reflective, and it’s compounding… you’ll stutter over your words when you feel very heightened and emotional about something, and I’ll repeat them.”
Live Feedback:
“Oh yeah, which is not as much as I got a little older, but yeah. Okay, especially when you were younger… especially when it comes to etymology of words, and planning and all that sort of thing.”
Themes:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Communication difficulties under emotional stress
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Self-criticism about expression (retrograde redirects criticism inward)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Detailed analysis as coping mechanism

PARTICIPANT C: SHARON (11th House Lilith Semi-Sextile Chiron)
Chart Details:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Lilith at 11 degrees Taurus
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * 11th house (friendships, groups, technology)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Semi-sextile with Chiron
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Also has Cancer 12th house themes
Interpretation:
“Has to do with friendships, has to do with technology, has to do with groups of people… especially as it pertains to your own beliefs… semi-sextile with Chiron though… Even once you feel like you’re in a group…you can still feel like you don’t want to say, you don’t want to speak; you’re afraid that you don’t know things.”
Real-World Manifestation:
 Sharon actively helps translate and explain concepts in the community:
“I see all the comments. When you guys are helping each other like that, when like Sharon, when you are helping people, and you’re translating… not necessarily translating the language, but translating the thing.”
Chiron-Lilith Interaction:
“If we take that safety… with the North Node and then Lilith with our raw version of that, it all has to lead into Chiron because even once you feel, even once you feel like you’re in a group, and I’m like, I feel okay… you can still feel like you don’t want to say, you don’t want to speak; you’re afraid that you don’t know things. We’ve talked about this; you’ve talked about this a lot.”
12th House Lilith Theme:
“Sharon (Cancer, Lilith in 12th): ‘Cancer spirituality is my jam, but blocked it most of my life. Exactly. It’s your jam because, and the way that you see it…no one else gets it but you.’”
Activity at Time of Webinar:
 Sharon was crocheting during the call—creative outlet as Lilith expression.

PARTICIPANT D: COLLEEN (8th/9th House, Business Authority Issues)
Chart Details:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Lilith in 8th/9th house (likely Capricorn)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Saturn retrograde in 8th
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Conjunction with North Node
Interpretation:
“Again, you’ve got your, you have shame coming before reaction… and you have it in conjunction with all of this… direct. You have your Saturn in retrograde, which is pulling intimacy, shared resources, things of that nature, and your North node…”
Live Feedback:
“I run my own business, and I’m the only one running it at the moment, because I’m too afraid to actually hire anyone because of this energy, I think, and you’re supposed to be delegating.”
Additional Detail:
“Yeah, that makes sense… I hate telling other people what to do because I hate being told what to do.”
Themes:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Authority resistance (can’t delegate)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Intimacy/shared resources challenges
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Self-employment as solution to authority issues
________________


PARTICIPANT E: AMY (8th House Sexual Empowerment)
Chart Details:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Lilith in 8th house
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Themes: intimacy, shared resources, taboo
Interpretation:
 Shame into intimacy/shared resources/debt, “collaborative aspect… more taboo aspects of things that are either more spiritual or more creative, and being able to apply that, rework all of that, be more comfortable with being able to rework all and apply it in…”
Live Feedback:
“Years, recently I’ve been really thinking of bringing back my woman’s sexual empowerment retreats… but me just bringing the people together to show people that there isn’t shame around that area because I guess I had so much shame in that area.”
Before/After:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Had deep shame around sexuality (8th house Lilith)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Created empowerment retreats to address this
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Considering restarting work after years away
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Transformation from repressed to healer/facilitator
________________


PARTICIPANT F: TANYA (10th House Stellium: Mean Lilith, True Lilith, Chiron)
Chart Details:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * 10th house stellium: Mean Lilith, True Lilith, and Chiron all in orb
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Order: Mean Lilith → True Lilith → Chiron
Interpretation:
“The order obviously matters, mean Lilith, true Lilith, Chiron. So you have all of these working together. So it’s not only do you feel this agitation within, but you feel guilt and shame first, and then you feel insecure about it. And this is a challenging one, because obviously all of that energy is internalized, so you don’t have that. I want to lash back out.”
Live Feedback:
“I have a hard time speaking up when it comes to a person of authority… right, because you don’t feel like you’re supposed to. And I get that, I get that visceral response to where it’s like that fight or flight feeling. You get a shake. Yes, but if it’s just a normal, normal person, I don’t I don’t feel that, right. I have the same thing, by the way.”
Themes:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Authority issues (10th house)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Layered repression: Guilt/shame → visceral reaction → insecurity
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Physical response to authority (shaking, fight-or-flight)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Different response to peers vs. authority figures
Chiron-Lilith Compounding:
“So normally when we’re just talking about one energy, we say, yada, yada, but for you, you have insecurity that leads into this thing of bringing people in. So you already have that insecurity, even that that should be power in how you see things. There’s Chiron, and Chiron is like, I’m trying to bring things in because I’m trying to prove that I knew something; I’m trying to prove that I have the authority over something. So the ‘I told you so’ is more like, you should have listened to me I knew this; you didn’t listen to me, blah, blah, blah. And it happens, and it creates a friction between you and those other people, and they don’t like it.”

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Aspects to Moon and Chiron

Like, um, when you have an aha moment… you have that shame; like you feel like you should have known that before, like why didn’t I already know this now? It all makes sense type of energy, uh, and all of that leading back into, um, whether or not you feel like it’s okay to communicate that with others.”

“Oh my God, yeah… prior to circle, yeah.”

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Shame about “late” realizations in groups
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Communication hesitation in group settings
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * “Should have known this already” guilt

Chart Details:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Both mean and true Lilith
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * True Lilith retrograde
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Placements in Libra (3rd/7th house themes)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Chiron conjunct Psyche and retrograde
Interpretation:
“When it comes to strategy around family… nurturing, when it comes to dealing with other people, being a bit more intimate, being a bit more personal with other people… sometimes that you can feel like you have to conform to other people’s beliefs… you feel like you can’t say these things; you can’t communicate. And then it adds in with the Chiron here, which is conjuncture, psyche, and retrograde.”
Live Feedback (Communication Strategy):
“Yes, and with one of my closest friends, I always ask her, do you want my true opinion or do you want me to be the okay? And she says, and I’m like, okay, yeah. And that’s what works for me, right?”
Themes:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Permission-based communication (“Do you want my true opinion?”)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Conformity pressure in relationships
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Strategic navigation of when to be authentic vs. compliant

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Fusion cusp merging 2nd/3rd house (Gemini/Cancer themes)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Lilith sextile Ascendant
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * North Node present

Also, your siblings have something to do with that as well, because again, you’re in the fusion cusp area.”
Themes:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Self-worth shame (2nd house)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Can’t voice self-value (3rd house)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Family/sibling influence on repression
