PART 10: HOUSE-BY-HOUSE THEMES (EXTRACTED FROM EXAMPLES)
Important Note: The transcript does not provide a formal, sequential 1st-12th house breakdown. However, the following themes emerged through participant examples:
2nd House (Self-Worth, Resources):
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Shame around valuing oneself
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Inability to verbally claim self-worth
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Material security tied to repression
3rd House (Communication, Siblings, Details):
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Stuttering or hesitation under emotional stress
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Self-criticism about expression
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * “Can’t say what I really think”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Etymology, planning, scheduling obsessions as coping
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Family/sibling influence on voice
4th House (Home, Mother, Roots):
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Guilt around nurturing/mothering
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Shame about home management
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Emotional abandonment from mother
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Need for deeper intimate family connection
5th/6th House (Creativity/Work/Routine - Instructor’s Placement):
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Criticism compulsion
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * “This is highly inefficient”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Abandonment of creative passions due to rejection
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Work becomes outlet for repressed creativity
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Shame around “taboo” income sources
8th House (Intimacy, Shared Resources, Taboo):
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Sexual shame and repression
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Power dynamics in intimate relationships
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Taboo work or creative expression
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Transformation through embracing shadow
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Authority issues in delegation (shared resources)
9th House (Beliefs, Philosophy, Higher Learning):
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Shame around unconventional beliefs
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Spiritual or philosophical outsider status
10th House (Career, Authority, Public Status):
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Most emphasized (instructor calls it “most important thing outside of the ascendant for your career”)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Authority issues (can’t be the boss, can’t delegate)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Shaking/physical response to authority figures
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * “I told you so” energy when insecure
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Shame around taking leadership
11th House (Groups, Friends, Networks):
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Feeling like “the mother” of groups
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Shame within group settings
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * “Should have known this already” guilt
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Technology and group safety
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Finding your tribe vs. feeling outcast
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Being translator/helper but feeling unqualified
12th House (Spirituality, Hidden Self, Isolation):
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Blocked spirituality (“Cancer spirituality is my jam, but blocked it most of my life”)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Intuition feels “off”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Creative blockages
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Not feeling safe being different
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * “No one else gets it but you”

PART 11: ASPECT ANALYSIS
Lilith-Chiron Aspects
Semi-Sextile (Sharon’s Chart):
“Even once you feel like you’re in a group… you can still feel like you don’t want to say, you don’t want to speak; you’re afraid that you don’t know things.”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Chiron’s insecurity feeds Lilith’s repression
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Creates compounding effect even in safe spaces
Conjunction (Tanya’s 10th House Stellium):
“Mean Lilith, true Lilith, Chiron. So you have all of these working together. So it’s not only do you feel this agitation within, but you feel guilt and shame first, and then you feel insecure about it.”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Order matters: Which comes first determines flow
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Guilt/shame → visceral reaction → insecurity
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * All energy is internalized (can’t lash out)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Creates “I told you so” compensation behavior
Opposition (Instructor’s Chart):
“My true Lilith opposes my Chiron… That’s a tough one.”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Tension between wound (Chiron) and raw need (Lilith)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Must balance both ends of polarity
Lilith-Moon Aspects
Conjunction (Jen’s Chart):
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Motherhood themes amplified
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Security/safety needs conflict with authentic expression
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * “Am I a good mom?” guilt cycle
General Moon-Lilith Theme:
“Remember all of these are also tied into mother as well. Uh-hh, so these elements of guilt and shame are things that you felt from your mother, um, where she didn’t necessarily understand you.”
Lilith-Ascendant Aspects
Sextile (Silas’s Chart):
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Self-worth and identity directly connected
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Can’t verbally claim value despite feeling it
General Principle:
“If it creates an aspect to one of your vitality anchors, the ascendant, descendant, mid heaven, and sub heaven… these points are extremely important just for clarity.”

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 2. Creating own systems: Verizon sales team collaboration despite corporate rules
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 3. Taboo income sources: Fetish content business (shame → liberation → financial success)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 4. Music abandonment: “We already have a white boy rapper” → gave up on music entirely

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 1. Colleen: Won’t hire employees due to authority shame
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 2. Jen: “Mother” role at bank/mortgage department
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 3. Amy: Women’s sexual empowerment retreats (transforming 8th house shame)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Helps translate for others despite feeling unqualified

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Stutters when emotionally heightened
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Especially when younger
Family/Motherhood Manifestations:
Instructor’s Guilt:
“I feel guilty; I feel shame because I abandoned my child; I haven’t been true to myself, and I would have felt the other way had I not been true to myself. I would have felt the same thing.”
Daughter’s Oracle Card:
“She held one up, it was an Oracle card, and it said, you have nothing to be guilty about… She doubled down on it, but I feel guilty.”
Jen’s Experience:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Called “the mother” at work
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Works in mortgages/banking (home/house themes)
