PART 13: TAMING VS. EMBRACING METHODOLOGY
The Decision Framework
Step 1: Let Her Out of the Cage
“We have to start embracing what… And we have to make sure that we don’t go so far as to alienate all their people, alienate society, alienate ourselves from reality.”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Acknowledge the energy
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Investigate without judgment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Don’t repress (leads to illness/shadow)
Step 2: Don’t Let Her Off the Leash
“If you let her off of the leash… there’s this feeling of I could just let go right now. I could let go, and I could drift off into the ether of space, and I would have no responsibility. I would have no connection to anybody.”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Don’t indulge every impulse uncritically
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Maintain connection to others and reality
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Balance expression with responsibility
Questions to Ask (Taming Process):
For Mean Lilith (Internal):
“The first thing with mean Lilith is to say, why do I feel guilty about this? Why do I feel shameful about this? Is there actually shame here or is this something I needed? And that’s the question you have to ask yourself when it comes to that, is why am I allowing this to play out where I can’t be me because I’m supposed to be like everybody else?”
For Osculating Lilith (External/Visceral):
“Instead, what I did is I claimed my power. I claimed my power, and the thing that they criticized me on, I turned into a lesson, not a lesson to prove them wrong or show anything against them. I just made that the next thing I’m going to talk about.”
Embracing Process:
1. Power Reclamation:
 Turn criticism/wound into teaching or creative opportunity
2. Radical Self-Acceptance:
“Lilith represents in both forms radical self-acceptance… This is really you. Where’s your Lilith? That’s you. When you’re building a business, your Lilith is what you’re supposed to focus on.”
3. Strategic Application:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Find outlets (creative, business, spiritual) that respect both self and others
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Don’t deny needs, but reflect before acting them out
4. Community Building:
“What makes you special? What makes you different? What makes you, what do you really need in terms of security, in terms of your deep inner wants? How do I pull in other people who are crazy too?”
Seek/attract others who are similarly “radical” or unconventional.
Retrograde-Specific Guidance:
For Osculating Retrograde Lilith:
“Also, realizing that with Lilith in retrograde, you can’t find what’s safe; you have to make what’s safe. This is one of those retrograde things: if Jupiter’s natural, you go find opportunity. If Jupiter is retrograde or not direct retrograde, you have to make opportunity or find opportunity within opportunity. So if you have Lilith and osculating Lilith retrograde, then you don’t have the same energy that says, I’m gonna go somewhere and it’s going to be safe. I’m going to go somewhere and while I’m there, I’m gonna go find my safe space in there.”
Key Principle:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Can’t find safety externally
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Must create safety internally/intentionally
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Find niche within larger groups (“on the fringe”)
________________


PART 14: HEALING AND OPTIMIZATION STRATEGIES
Core Healing Principles
1. Radical Self-Acceptance:
“Ultimately, Lilith represents in both forms radical self-acceptance. The problem is that we are so trained and indoctrinated by social norms, conventional upbringing, all of these things that happen in the world, how other people do it, that nobody allows other people to be themselves.”
2. Recognize Internal vs. External Oppression:
“If you actually pay attention to mean Lilith, nobody told you that you weren’t allowed to do this. Nobody said that. Nobody said you can’t do this. It’s just that when you express yourself in that way, you get a reaction from other people, and it’s not, sometimes it’s verbal, but it’s usually not. It’s usually a feeling.”
3. Move from Insight to Action:
“But we don’t wanna get lost in shadow work. We don’t wanna get lost in understanding to a point where we feel like we’re fixing. We wanna get to a point where we say, how can we use, how can we take these feelings and these natural raw desires? How can we take them and reflect those back into our marriage, into our work, into our children and parenting, into our creative endeavors, our own business?”
Practical Techniques
Journaling Prompts:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 1. “Why do I feel guilty about this?”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 2. “Is there actually shame here or is this something I needed?”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 3. “Am I allowing this to play out where I can’t be me because I’m supposed to be like everybody else?”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 4. “How can I take this raw desire and reflect it back into [specific life area]?”
Reflection Practice:
“What it does for you positively, it allows you to reflect on these things. What makes you special? What makes you different?”
Business/Career Application:
“When you’re building a business, your Lilith is what you’re supposed to focus on… It is the most important thing outside of the ascendant for your career. It literally tells you who you are, how you’re gonna do it, and what’s important to you.”
Integration with Alchemistic Concepts
Energy Flow (PHSR):
 Always track which Lilith (mean or osculating) comes first and feeds into what.
Delegates:
 Check which planets rule houses where Lilith sits—those planets act as delegates amplifying or coloring Lilith’s impact.
Fusion Cusp:
 When Lilith straddles houses, hybrid effects occur (not averaged, but blended).
Retrograde Doctrine:
 Retrograde osculating Lilith means energy is compounding internally, requiring “making” safety rather than “finding” it.
Lenses:
 Lilith applies differently depending on question asked (career lens, relationship lens, health lens, etc.).
________________


PART 15: COMMON MISTAKES AND MISCONCEPTIONS
Technical/Calculation Errors
1. Using Interpolated Lilith:
“You have the Priapus, which is interpolated, and we have Lilith, which is interpolated. We don’t want either of these two because an interpolated Lilith or an interpreted Priapus… These two are basically averages between osculating and mean. And it’s, I haven’t found any validity for these, so I don’t use them.”
Correct Method:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Use H13 for osculating/true Lilith
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Use mean for averaged/internalized Lilith
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Avoid interpolated versions entirely
2. Ignoring Osculating/True Lilith:
“Very rarely do people talk about oscillating Lilith, which is ironic because it’s actually more important, in my opinion.”
3. Confusing “Mean” as “Angry”:
“Mean means average, right? It doesn’t mean mean; however, it does mean mean. So, it’s the word M-E-A-N, because it’s the average.”
Interpretive Mistakes
4. Over-Relying on Mythology:
“You love the Lilith backstory; it’s a great backstory. Some of it doesn’t apply to the astrology, but it’s fun.”
Don’t use myth as literal predictive tool.
5. Conflating Chiron and Lilith:
“It doesn’t share the exact thing; it really doesn’t share any of the themes of Chiron unless it’s linked to it.”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Chiron = public wound/compensation
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Lilith = private shame/authenticity
6. Assuming Social Rejection is Real:
“Other people are not making you feel that way; you’re making yourself feel that way.”
Most Lilith shame is internalized/projected, not externally imposed.
7. Ignoring Energy Flow/Order:
“Order of planets, the exact placement, the way the energy flows in terms of zodiacally, or, you know, whether it’s applying or separating, which one came first, which one has to be resolved, which one’s causing the friction; super important stuff.”
Lesser degree comes first—this determines how themes manifest sequentially.
8. Not Distinguishing Mean vs. Osculating Manifestations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Mean: Internal, consistent, thematic (guilt/shame)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Osculating: External, acute, visceral (raw reactions)
9. Treating Lilith Transits as One-Time Events:
“True Lilith returns happen in clusters.”
Due to erratic orbit, returns come in groups, not single events.
10. Getting Lost in Shadow Work:
“We don’t wanna get lost in understanding to a point where we feel like we’re fixing.”
Must move from insight to practical application quickly.
________________


PART 16: APP DEVELOPMENT SPECIFICATIONS
Database Requirements
Core Data Storage:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 1. Birth Data: Full timestamp (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS), location (latitude/longitude)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 2. Lilith Positions:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Mean Lilith (degree, sign, house)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Osculating/True Lilith (degree, sign, house, retrograde status)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 3. Standard Chart Points:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Ascendant, Descendant, Midheaven, IC/Subheaven
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Sun, Moon, all major planets
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * North/South Node
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Chiron
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 4. Aspect Data:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * All aspects between Lilith(s) and other points
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Orbs (default 3°, user-adjustable)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 5. User History:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Journal entries
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Shadow work notes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Progress tracking
Calculation Methods
Ephemeris Requirements:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Use precise ephemeris (JPL/Swiss Ephemeris recommended)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * H13 for osculating Lilith calculation
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Standard mean calculation for averaged position
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Must support retrograde detection for osculating only
Key Calculations:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 1. Degree, sign, house for both Liliths
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 2. Zodiacal order (which comes first)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 3. Retrograde status (osculating only)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 4. Aspects to all vitality anchors and major points
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 5. Fusion cusp detection (within 1-2° of house boundary)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 6. Return cycles (8.85-year average, cluster prediction)
UI Presentation Guidelines
Chart Display:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 1. Show both mean and osculating Lilith clearly labeled
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 2. Display degrees/sign/house for each
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 3. Visual indicators for:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Which Lilith comes first (energy flow arrows)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Retrograde status (R symbol for osculating)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Fusion cusp positions (highlighted border/color)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 4. Aspect lines color-coded by type
Interpretation Modules:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 1. Toggle views:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Mean Lilith interpretation
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Osculating Lilith interpretation
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Combined/integrated view
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 2. Energy flow visualization:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Show sequential order
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Indicate which planets/points are affected in sequence
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 3. House/sign/aspect breakdowns:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Separate cards/sections for each
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 4. Context popups:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Technical term definitions
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * “What is mean vs. osculating?” explainers
Sensitivity Features:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 1. Content warnings for heavy themes:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Sexual trauma
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Abandonment
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Abuse/toxicity
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Death/loss
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 2. Anonymous mode:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Optional hiding of specific interpretations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 3. Trigger shields:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Allow users to skip or minimize sensitive content
Interpretation Logic Flow
Step 1: Position Analysis
IF mean_lilith.degree < osculating_lilith.degree:
    primary_lilith = mean_lilith
    secondary_lilith = osculating_lilith
ELSE:
    primary_lilith = osculating_lilith
    secondary_lilith = mean_lilith


Display: "Your [primary] Lilith at [degree] [sign] in [house] 
         creates [theme], which then flows into your [secondary] 
         Lilith at [degree] [sign] in [house], manifesting as [theme]."


Step 2: Retrograde Check
IF osculating_lilith.retrograde == TRUE:
    interpretation += "Your osculating Lilith is retrograde, 
                       meaning this energy redirects inward. 
                       Instead of reacting to others, you turn 
                       frustration/rebellion on yourself. 
                       You must CREATE safety rather than FIND it."


Step 3: Aspect Integration
FOR each aspect TO [Asc, MC, Desc, IC, Sun, Moon, Chiron, Nodes]:
    IF aspect EXISTS:
        interpretation += aspect_specific_text
        IF aspect TO Chiron:
            interpretation += "This compounds wound/shame cycles..."
        IF aspect TO Moon:
            interpretation += "Maternal themes, security needs..."


Step 4: Fusion Cusp Detection
IF abs(lilith.degree - house_cusp.degree) <= 2:
    interpretation += "Your Lilith is on a FUSION CUSP, 
                       blending themes of [house1] and [house2]. 
                       Expect hybrid manifestations..."


Step 5: House/Sign Themes
 Load pre-written content for:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * House placement (1st-12th)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Sign placement (Aries-Pisces)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Combine with energy flow analysis
Step 6: Practical Application Prompts
Display journaling prompts based on house:
- 3rd house: "How do you censor your communication?"
- 8th house: "What intimacy needs feel forbidden?"
- 10th house: "Where do you shrink from authority?"
etc.


Healing/Optimization Module
Shadow Work Tools:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 1. Journaling prompts based on Lilith placement
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 2. Reflection questions:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * “Is this shame mine or projected?”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * “What need is trying to be met?”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 3. Progress tracking:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Before/after awareness notes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Integration milestones
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 4. Action steps:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 * Specific suggestions for business, creativity, relationships
Taming vs. Embracing Guidance:
Display decision tree:
1. "Let her out of the cage" - Acknowledge the energy
   → Prompt: "What am I repressing in [house] area?"


2. "Don't let her off the leash" - Maintain balance
   → Prompt: "How can I express this WITHOUT alienating others?"


3. Apply to life areas
   → Prompt: "How can I use this in my [career/marriage/parenting]?"


Ethical Presentation Standards
Language Guidelines:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 1. Affirming, not pathologizing:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * ❌ “You are damaged in this area”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    * ✅ “This area holds untapped power waiting for acceptance”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    2. Empowering, not deterministic:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * ❌ “You will always struggle with authority”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       * ✅ “Authority themes offer opportunities for self-mastery”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       3. Actionable, not just descriptive:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * ❌ “You feel shame about sexuality”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * ✅ “Your 8th house Lilith invites you to reclaim power through embracing taboo desires”
Content Warnings:
“This reading touches on [shame/sexuality/trauma/abandonment].
We present this information for healing, not to reopen wounds.
Please proceed with self-care and seek support if needed.”
Resource Links:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Therapy/counseling directories
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Support groups
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Crisis hotlines (if severe trauma indicated)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Community forums (moderated)
Disclaimers:
“Astrology is a tool for self-insight, not medical/psychological diagnosis.
For clinical concerns, please consult licensed professionals.”
User Experience Priorities
1. Emotional Safety:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Gentle delivery of difficult content
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Always provide hope/path forward
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Normalize struggles (“You’re not alone in this”)
2. Autonomy:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Users control depth of shadow work
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Can skip or revisit content anytime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Optional anonymity for sensitive topics
3. Progress Tracking:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Journal entries show growth over time
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Celebrate integration milestones
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Revisit readings as consciousness expands
4. Community (Optional):
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Share anonymized stories (with consent)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Peer validation reduces isolation
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Moderated forums for discussion
5. Educational Transparency:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Explain WHY certain interpretations are given
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Show calculation methods (technical users)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Provide sources/citations for teachings
________________


PART 17: ADVANCED CONCEPTS AND Q&A
Lilith Returns
Cycle Timing:
“We have a Lilith return almost every nine years, and these Lilith returns are important, especially that last one, because that last one is going to last you for those nine years.”
8.85-Year Average:
 More precise than “9 years”—app should calculate exact returns.
Clustered Returns:
“Now, true Lilith returns happen in clusters.”
Due to erratic orbit, Lilith can return multiple times in a short period, then not return for years. App must predict clusters, not just single events.
Instructor’s Experience:
“After my divorce, I ended up leaving my child… This happened around a Lilith return. Every single time I left, I moved to Texas, I moved back. I moved to New York, I moved back. I moved to Virginia, I moved back, moved to North Carolina, moved back, Florida, moved back. The only time I didn’t was my Saturn return.”
Lilith and Career
Most Important Career Indicator (After Ascendant):
“It is the most important thing outside of the ascendant for your career. It literally tells you who you are, how you’re gonna do it, and what’s important to you.”
Why Career Connection:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Shows where you need radical authenticity
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Indicates areas of natural authority (even if repressed)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Reveals what makes you “crazy enough to believe” in your path
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Points to taboo/unconventional income sources that may be most lucrative
Instructor’s Proof:
 Fetish content business (8th house taboo) made millions, while conventional film work barely paid.
Lilith as Gut Instinct/Survival Mode
“Lilith is your survival mode; it is the thing that tells you I shouldn’t be here, I shouldn’t be doing this. This is more your gut feeling than your moon placement.”
Distinction:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Moon: Security, comfort, emotional needs
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Lilith: Survival instinct, danger sensing, “get out now” feeling
App Feature Idea:
 “Safety Compass” - tool to help users distinguish Moon (comfort) from Lilith (survival) responses in decision-making.
Lilith and Astro-Cartography
Question from audience about whether Lilith should be included in location readings.
Instructor’s Position:
 While not explicitly detailed in this webinar, the emphasis on Lilith’s importance suggests it should be factored into relocation astrology, especially for career/authenticity considerations.
Empty Focus and Oppositions
Philosophical Framework:
“This is called empty focus. The other name for black moon Lilith osculating is true lunar apogee… It’s not real; this is real. This is not real. However, we have to have a little bit of craziness; we have to have a little bit of not real in our lives because it makes us true to ourselves.”
Oppositions:
“Oppositions are not a pull… It’s your focus that’s doing that.”
Instructor challenges traditional opposition interpretation—not about external tension but about where you choose to focus attention.
Velocity and Orbital Mechanics
Audience Question (Tanya):
“Wouldn’t the way the planets orbit the sun affect the orbs within a chart?”
Instructor’s Response:
“See, I knew these questions were coming. That we haven’t proven, or that I haven’t proven, but I believe that. So it’s one of those shelved theories that I’m still testing. I’m still trying to figure out a couple of things. Velocity is usually consistent, so I don’t have to worry about that. But empty focus for other orbit patterns is one thing that I’ve thought of.”
App Development Note:
 Advanced/experimental feature could explore variable orbs based on orbital mechanics, but current system uses standard orbs.
South Node and Lilith Connection
“Mine’s conjunct my South node. Also, remember that the South node and Lilith are all mathematical points off of the moon itself, which should explain my childhood. So, the way that your mother reacted to you and the raw, visceral parts of your mother and your family are also expressed in Lilith.”
Mathematical Connection:
 Both South Node and Lilith are lunar-derived points, creating inherent resonance in interpretations, especially around:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Family/maternal themes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Childhood patterns
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Instinctual reactions
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Past-life themes (if user believes in that framework)
________________


PART 18: PHILOSOPHICAL FOUNDATIONS
Free Will vs. Determinism
Core Teaching:
“A lot of us think we have free will; we think we made choices. There is an illusion of free will that’s in there. A lot of times we think we’ve made choices. I always tell you, if I’m able to guess what you did by looking at your chart, you didn’t actually exert free will.”
True Free Will:
“If I’m doing a reading for you or someone else, another alchemistic astrologer is doing a reading and it’s within the same energy, but it’s not the expected outcome; that’s free will.”
Implications for App:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Don’t present interpretations as fixed destiny
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Emphasize choice and conscious engagement
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Frame readings as “potential state” that can be transformed into “kinetic state”
Radical Self-Acceptance
Central Philosophy:
“Lilith represents in both forms radical self-acceptance. The problem is that we are so trained and indoctrinated by social norms, conventional upbringing, all of these things that happen in the world, how other people do it, that nobody allows other people to be themselves. And the radical self-acceptance means true self. This is really you. Where’s your Lilith? That’s you.”
Identity Equation:
 Lilith = True Self
Not a wound, not a flaw, but who you actually are beneath social conditioning.
“The Crazy”
“And Lilith is our crazy. That’s the other thing. You love the Lilith backstory; it’s a great backstory. Some of it doesn’t apply to the astrology, but it’s fun. The Lilith in your chart is crazy. Are you crazy enough to believe what you’re doing? Are you crazy enough to do the things that you want to do? Or are you ashamed and you make yourself small in this world?”
Reframing “Crazy”:
 Not mentally ill, but unconventional/radical enough to:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Challenge norms
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Pursue authentic path
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Risk rejection for truth
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Build something others dismiss
Humility and Evolution
Instructor’s Stance:
“At the end of the day, I’ve also mentioned I don’t believe that I’m the best astrologer because I don’t believe that. I truly believe I am not the best astrologer… There will always be people better than me… At the end of the day, when it comes to even alchemistic astrology, whether it’s one of you guys in this room or listening to this replay, or somebody else that comes in the future, there’s going to be somebody who’s gonna surpass me.”
System Philosophy:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Alchemistic Astrology is evolving
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Community collaboration improves system
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * No one astrologer holds all truth
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Future practitioners will innovate further
App Implication:
 Build in feedback loops for users to contribute insights, challenge interpretations, suggest improvements.
Hypocrisy and Human Limitation
“Every single person on this planet is hypocritical on something.”
Teaching Point:
 Don’t expect perfection from yourself or your Lilith integration. Everyone contradicts themselves—the goal is awareness and gradual alignment, not flawless consistency.
________________


PART 19: CLOSING INSIGHTS AND SUMMARY
Webinar Conclusion
Instructor’s Hope:
“Are there any other questions to round out this Black Moon Lilith? I hope you guys gained value and insight over Black Moon Lilith. It’s one of those things; it’s really hard to find really good information on Black Moon Lilith. It’s one of those things that, without the testing and really seeing it play out, it could be hard to understand or interpret, which is why I took that extra time with you guys to go through multiple charts so you could see it and then obviously get the reaction from it.”
Educational Goal:
“I want to see people learn alchemistic astrology be like, Oh, damn, this is real. I learned it. I millionaire. I want to see that. Gotta gotta add that correction. Which correction? Billionaire? Yeah, the whole thing. That’s what I want.”
Community Appreciation:
 Multiple participants expressed gratitude:
“When I was your age, I did not have my head on my shoulders. I definitely didn’t believe in astrology, I didn’t have any guidance or anything like that… You have no idea how much I appreciate your astrology and this community, so thank you so much.”
Authority Deflection:
“I feel like you’re the authority in astrology. Dammit, that’s very kind of you. I don’t see myself as the authority; I don’t want to be the authority.”
(Notably, this is a 10th house Lilith manifestation—discomfort with being seen as authority despite teaching expertise.)

PART 20: KEY QUOTES FOR APP INTEGRATION
Technical Quotes
“H 13 is osculating Lilith. This is true Lilith; this is the one that you should have in here so that you make sure that you have that entered, and you can see it on your chart over here.”
“Mean means average… It has to do with the smooth route of the moon in its orbit around the earth, and it gives us a very non-specific but averaged out rounded a point that is the average focal area of Lilith.”
“Oscillating Lilith factors in all of that gravitational pull to give you very precise positioning of where Lilith truly is; if you factor everything else.”
“Order of planets, the exact placement, the way the energy flows in terms of zodiacally, or, you know, whether it’s applying or separating, which one came first, which one has to be resolved, which one’s causing the friction; super important stuff.”
Philosophical Quotes
“Along with Chiron, I think this is one of the most important points in your chart.”
“Lilith represents in both forms radical self-acceptance… This is really you. Where’s your Lilith? That’s you.”
“I used to say a long time ago if you wanna use Lilith properly, you have to let her out of the cage, but not let her off of the leash.”
“If I’m able to guess what you did by looking at your chart, you didn’t actually exert free will.”
“When you’re building a business, your Lilith is what you’re supposed to focus on.”
“It is the most important thing outside of the ascendant for your career. It literally tells you who you are, how you’re gonna do it, and what’s important to you.”
Healing Quotes
“But we don’t wanna get lost in shadow work. We don’t wanna get lost in understanding to a point where we feel like we’re fixing. We wanna get to a point where we say, how can we use, how can we take these feelings and these natural raw desires? How can we take them and reflect those back into our marriage, into our work, into our children and parenting, into our creative endeavors, our own business?”
“The first thing with mean Lilith is to say, why do I feel guilty about this? Why do I feel shameful about this? Is there actually shame here or is this something I needed?”
“With Lilith in retrograde, you can’t find what’s safe; you have to make what’s safe.”
