SUMMARY FOR DEVELOPERS
Transcript 17: Taming & Embracing Black Moon Lilith provides the most comprehensive treatment of Lilith in Alchemistic Astrology. Key implementation requirements:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1. Calculate BOTH mean and osculating Lilith (H13 ephemeris)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2. Determine energy flow order (which comes first by degree)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          3. Check retrograde status (osculating only)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          4. Map aspects to all vitality anchors, nodes, Chiron, planets
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          5. Detect fusion cusps (within 1-2° of house boundary)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          6. Provide distinct interpretations for mean (internal/shame) vs. osculating (external/visceral)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          7. Include healing/optimization modules with journaling prompts
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          8. Implement sensitivity warnings for trauma/taboo content
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          9. Use empowering, non-deterministic language throughout
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          10. Track returns (8.85-year cycle, clustered patterns)
Lilith is positioned as THE most important career indicator after the Ascendant, and represents the user’s true authentic self beneath social conditioning. The app must handle this point with exceptional care, technical precision, and healing-oriented presentation.

TRANSCRIPT 18: FCA VS OOI CUSP WEBINAR
Harvard-Level Knowledge Extraction for Alchemistic Astrology App Development
Date: January 18, 2025
Topic: Fusion Cusp Area (FCA) vs. Orb of Influence (OOI) - Technical Distinctions
Word Count: ~22,000 words
Instructor: Logan (Alchemistic Astrology System)
________________


PART 1: INTRODUCTION AND WEBINAR PURPOSE
Opening Framework
Purpose Statement (Verbatim):
“Welcome to the Orb of Influence versus the Fusion Cusp Area webinar. I got through it. That’s great. We are going to talk about what the difference is when a planet is sitting within a Fusion Cusp Area, which is from 28.5 degrees to 1.5 degrees of the next sign versus when it’s sitting before 28.5 degrees and the orb of influence is reaching into the next sign.”
Core Distinction:
“So the concepts are, they seem very similar on the surface until you start actually looking at what we’re talking about here. So one of the main things between the two is whether or not you have a secondary ruler.”
Why This Matters
This webinar addresses a fundamental gap in traditional astrology:
The Problem with “Anaretic Degrees”:
“Anaeretic degrees and critical degrees is a big thing in traditional astrology and when I got to it I just had a gut feeling that that didn’t make any sense. Because they would, I don’t like when you dwell on something. I don’t like when somebody dwells on something and explains away everything with a, well, it’s at 29 degrees. So, you know, whatever. I was like, why? Why does 29 degrees matter? Why do you keep saying zero and 29 degrees? Why do you keep saying that? Oh, it’s an aneretic degree. I get that you’re calling it that, but give me some sort of proof. Like, tell me why. I need the mechanics of it. Nobody could answer that question.”
The Solution: Mechanical Understanding
“So then I started looking at it and I started realizing that it’s not just 29 degrees. It kind of seeps into the 28-degree marker. And if any of you guys have gone through your progressions, when something hits 28 and a half degrees, it feels like 29 degrees. It feels like 29 and a half degrees. You’re sitting there like this needs to end. You feel that. You feel that other energy creeping in. You’re like, ‘I’m ready to move on.’ And it’s like, ‘Why do you feel that?’ You know, it’s not necessarily the orb of influence. Like that’s definitely reaching into the next, but it doesn’t— the reason why it feels like you’re supposed to be in the next energy is because you are in the next energy, right? When you hit 28 and a half degrees, the other energy seeping in, you’re in it.”
________________


PART 2: TECHNICAL DEFINITIONS
FUSION CUSP AREA (FCA)
Exact Definition:
“Fusion Cusp Area, which is from 28.5 degrees to 1.5 degrees of the next sign.”
Degree Range:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * 28.5° to 29°59’59" of current sign
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * 0°00’ to 1.5° of next sign
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Total span: 3 degrees (1.5° on each side of cusp)
Key Characteristics:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1. Energy Blending: Both sign/house energies actively mix
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2. Secondary Ruler: The next sign’s ruler becomes an active secondary ruler
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          3. Intensification: “Because they’re overlapped, it’s hitting multiple energies… it intensifies”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          4. Bidirectional Flow: Energy flows both ways across the cusp
Visual Metaphor:
“It’s energy. It pulsates. It’s fluid. It’s malleable. It’s just like light. If you shine two lights next to each other, you’re going to have spill off in the middle, a red light and a… A blue light is going to have a purple overlay if they, you know, come across if they’re too close to each other, right? It’s the same type of vibe that you’re going to get here.”
Overlapping Papers Analogy:
“Like if you were to take overlapping papers and you were to put them actually overlap them just a little bit, right? And you were to take, you know, there’s a line here and a line here, and you were to take a pin and put it, what side of the line is that pin sitting? The pinpoint is happening in the eighth house… The energies are happening definitively on this side of that line versus this side, but they are overlapping. Right. So therefore that energy is seeped in.”
ORB OF INFLUENCE (OOI)
Definition:
“Mars has a four-degree orb of influence. You know, so it’s already reaching into the next sign and then it’s not at 28 and a half. So this would be an example of it sitting within the orb of influence, it’s reaching into the next sign, but not within the fusion cusperia.”
Key Characteristics:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1. Extension, Not Blending: Influence reaches but doesn’t mix
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2. No Secondary Ruler: Only primary ruler applies
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          3. Byproduct Effect: “It is just kind of a byproduct… as opposed to when it’s in the fusion cusp area. It is directly influencing that.”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          4. Unidirectional: Energy flows into next house but doesn’t create true blend
Critical Distinction (Verbatim):
“And the main difference between those is whether or not the energies of the next sign are encapsulating the energies of the previous planet. So when it is sitting here like this at 27 degrees, we’re going to read it… Mars is going to stay. Its ruler is the moon. It is only reaching into the next energy. It is not mixed with it, if that makes sense.”
“However, when you read this, you’re not really going to use… Not really. You’re not ever going to use the sun as a secondary ruler for Mars. Mars is going to stay. Its ruler is the moon. It is only reaching into the next energy. It is not mixed with it.”
Comparison Table
Aspect
	Orb of Influence (OOI)
	Fusion Cusp Area (FCA)
	Degree Range
	Before 28.5° (within planet’s orb)
	28.5°-29°59’ OR 0°-1.5° next sign
	Energy Dynamic
	Extension/reach
	Blending/fusion
	Secondary Ruler
	❌ No
	✅ Yes
	House Assignment
	Original house only
	Original house (primary) + next house (blended)
	Interpretation
	“Pours energy slightly into next house”
	“Directly influencing… simultaneous motion”
	Intensity
	Normal
	Intensified (hitting multiple energies)
	________________


PART 3: THE SECONDARY RULER CONCEPT
When Does Secondary Ruler Apply?
FCA Only:
“So one of the main things between the two is whether or not you have a secondary ruler.”
Example: Mars at 29°50’ Cancer (FCA):
“To read this, you’re going to do exactly the same thing you did before, but you’re going to add one component. So this Mars at 29 degrees is still by orb of influence reaching in. But to be completely honest, that only really matters if there’s another planet over here. If there’s no other planet, the orb of influence is kind of irrelevant because it’s already sitting within the fusion cusp area, which means it’s already blending the area, the energies from the second house from the first house into the second house, and the energies of the first house pulling the second house in because of that overlap. What you’re doing is you’re reading the sun, because it’s the ruler of Leo, you’re reading this as a secondary ruler. You’re reading the moon as the primary ruler because it is definitively in the first house. It is a first house placement. But because it’s in that fusion cuspary, it’s blending the energies of the second house. And as a result, the sun becomes a second ruler. For Mars.”
Ruling Planet Hierarchy:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1. Primary Ruler: Ruler of the sign/house the planet is ACTUALLY in (by cusp line)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2. Secondary Ruler: Ruler of the NEXT sign/house (only in FCA)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          3. Both Active: Interpretation must integrate both rulers’ placements and aspects
House Belonging vs. Energy Blending
Critical Clarification:
“The house ‘belonging’ is determined by the side of the cusp/houselines, not merely by degree proximity.”
Example Breakdown:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Mars at 29°50’ Cancer is definitively in the 1st house (before cusp)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * But because it’s in FCA, it blends 2nd house energy
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Primary ruler: Moon (Cancer/1st house)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Secondary ruler: Sun (Leo/2nd house)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Must read both in interpretation
________________


PART 4: MATHEMATICAL/ASTRONOMICAL BASIS
The 28.5° Threshold
Not Arbitrary:
“When I got to it I just had a gut feeling that that didn’t make any sense… So then I started looking at it and I started realizing that it’s not just 29 degrees. It kind of seeps into the 28-degree marker. And if any of you guys have gone through your progressions, when something hits 28 and a half degrees, it feels like 29 degrees.”
Empirical Basis:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Progressions: People report feeling the shift at 28.5°, not 29°
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Client Experience: “You feel that other energy creeping in”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Consistent Observation: Not a single-degree phenomenon
Precision Matters:
“Technically, technically, if we’re using a strict 28… but these two are conjunct anyway. So you have a similar influence. It’s just not as heavy, so to speak.”
Energy as Fluid, Not Fixed
Core Philosophy:
“It’s energy. It pulsates. It’s fluid. It’s malleable. It’s just like light.”
Gradient Effect:
“…imagine for a second the interlocking of these energies and a gradient effect from the first house seeping into the second house. If I did this properly, it would also be two different colors, but the second house then seeping back into the first house.”
Not Binary:
 The energy doesn’t “switch” at 0° of a sign—it blends in the transition zone.
________________


PART 5: HISTORICAL DEVELOPMENT
Origin Story
The Problem:
“Anaeretic degrees, if you go back and research what anaeretic means, it’s some variant of fate and fortune, destiny, karma, all of those things. I was like, I don’t subscribe to that. So I need something that I can explain this away. But also when I see it, I know what it means. I know how it’s going to play out. And that’s where Fusion Cusp Area came.”
The “Born on a Cusp” Myth:
“And then it was a combination of everybody being like, ‘I was born on a cusp. No, you weren’t. You were born near a cusp.’”
Instructor’s Mandate:
“If you can’t prove it, it’s not good for me. And that’s just how I view things because I just need to be, if I’m going to show up and be like, this is what this means, I better back that ish up. That’s how I feel. And if I can’t prove myself, I’m a washout.”
Testing Process
“So I had to, so I was left with nothing with Chiron. I had to go back and like use this and use the astronomy of it and then just kind of like really kind of pull it together and be like and then test the theories and be like, ah, I see it. So I had to do the same thing with like all of these…”
Methodology:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1. Identify traditional concepts that lack mechanical explanation
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2. Observe actual client/personal experiences
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          3. Test theories against progressions and transits
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          4. Refine thresholds based on empirical feedback
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          5. Document repeatable patterns
________________


PART 6: INTERPRETATION METHODOLOGY
Step-by-Step Process
1. Determine Exact Degree:
 Check the planet’s precise degree (including arc minutes).
2. Classify as FCA or OOI:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * If 28.5° to 29°59’ OR 0° to 1.5°: FCA
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * If before 28.5° but within orb: OOI
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Otherwise: Standard placement
3. Identify Primary Ruler:
 Always the ruler of the sign/house the planet is IN (by cusp line).
4. Check for Secondary Ruler (FCA Only):
 If in FCA, identify the ruler of the NEXT sign/house.
5. Apply Energy Blending (FCA) or Extension (OOI):
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * FCA: “Blending the energies of the second house… as a result, the sun becomes a second ruler”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * OOI: “It is only reaching into the next energy. It is not mixed with it”
Layering Technique
Core Philosophy:
“I called it layering as opposed to like I fixed, in my opinion, I fixed dispositorship. Dispositorship was weird, but I liked what they were trying to do. I just thought you’re skipping a lot of things along the way. So the reason why, when I thought that, I said, layer it one layer at a time. Figure out what this means before you move on. That’s what the layering is supposed to be.”
Process:
“I figure out this energy. What’s this Venus? Give me all the information on this Venus placement. So when I understand this Venus placement, cool, I got that. Now what? Well Chiron’s in there too. Well what does that mean? Well first off it’s you know what 17 or so degrees away. Well what is 17 degrees away? First off I know that it means two separate decans but I also know that distance is time in astrology. I don’t know if i’ve taught this before but distance is time. So the closer two planets are, the sooner they’ll interact with each other, the sooner they’ll interact with transits. The further they get away, even within the same energy, the more time will pass before that second thing kicks in.”
Layering Steps:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1. Planet: What is the planet’s core energy?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2. House: Which house is it in? (primary)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          3. Sign: Which sign modifies the expression?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          4. Ruler: What is the primary ruler’s placement?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          5. FCA Check: If in FCA, add secondary house/sign/ruler
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          6. Aspects: How do aspects modify this?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          7. Decans: What decan adds additional nuance?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          8. Distance/Time: How far apart are related factors?
Integration Formula:
“That’s why I created that order. I said there’s a difference between saying Pluto’s energy feeding into the moon versus the moon feeding into Pluto… Planet-House-Sign-Ruler. Like you have to break it down like that.”
________________


PART 7: CHART EXAMPLES (COMPLETE TECHNICAL BREAKDOWNS)
EXAMPLE 1: Mars at 27° Cancer (OOI, Not FCA)
Date: April 10, 2025 (transits)
Technical Details:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Position: 27° Cancer
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * House: 1st house
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Orb: Mars has 4-degree orb of influence
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Calculation: 27° + 4° = 31° = reaches into 2nd house (Leo)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Classification: OOI (not in FCA because < 28.5°)
Interpretation (Verbatim):
“At 27 degrees and a four-degree orb of influence, we know that it reaches into the second house. So we know that it’s an Aries energy that’s expressed through Cancer… However, when you read this, you’re not really going to use… Not really. You’re not ever going to use the sun as a secondary ruler for Mars. Mars is going to stay. Its ruler is the moon. It is only reaching into the next energy. It is not mixed with it, if that makes sense.”
Reading Approach:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1. Primary Focus: Mars in Cancer, 1st house
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2. Primary Ruler: Moon (Cancer ruler)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          3. Secondary Ruler: ❌ NONE (not in FCA)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          4. Effect on 2nd House: Slight influence only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          5. Description: “Everything that happens in the first house… it’s going to lead directly into… and basically pour its energy very slightly into the second house, which links these two houses together.”
Key Point:
“Because it sits so close to the second house, though, this is going to infuse its energy into the second house… However, when you read this, you’re not really going to use… the sun as a secondary ruler for Mars.”
________________


EXAMPLE 2: Mars at 29°50’ Cancer (FCA)
Date: April 17, 2025 (transits, one week later)
Technical Details:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Position: 29°50’ Cancer
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * House: 1st house (still definitively in 1st)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Classification: FCA (> 28.5°)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Next Sign: Leo (2nd house)
Interpretation (Verbatim):
“So this one was, what, April 10th. This is April 17th, so a week later. And we’re on that verge, you know, 29.59 would be the last degree of cancer, but we are well within the fusion cusp area… you have Mars sitting here at 29 degrees, 50 arc minutes that is sitting right in that area.”
Reading Approach:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1. Primary Focus: Mars in Cancer, 1st house
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2. Primary Ruler: Moon (Cancer ruler) ✅
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          3. Secondary Ruler: Sun (Leo ruler) ✅
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          4. Blending Effect: Both house/sign energies active
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          5. Intensity: Increased (hitting multiple energies simultaneously)
Complete Breakdown:
“What you’re doing is you’re reading the sun, because it’s the ruler of Leo, you’re reading this as a secondary ruler. You’re reading the moon as the primary ruler because it is definitively in the first house. It is a first house placement. But because it’s in that fusion cuspary, it’s blending the energies of the second house. And as a result, the sun becomes a second ruler. For Mars, so in this for instance, we’re going to look for the moon. The moon is in Sagittarius for this one, and the sun is up here in, uh, Aries.”
Energy Flow:
“So when it’s in the fusion cusp area, or I’m sorry, when it’s in the fusion cusp area, it is directly influencing that. So your actions that you take through are through cancerian energy… it’s also at the same time through a secondhand motion and a simultaneous motion influencing your value, your money.”
Comparison to OOI:
“This will be different if it were at 27 degrees, because while it influences over… It’s not through the direct actions themselves. It is just kind of a byproduct… as opposed to when it’s in the fringe area, or I’m sorry, when it’s in the fusion cusp area. It is directly influencing that.”
________________


EXAMPLE 3: Ascendant in FCA
Technical Application:
“In terms of the ascendant, you do the same exact thing. The ascendant is your motivations… So the ascendant sitting in that Neptune decan of cancer is going to, uh, let’s ignore Mars for a second… the ascendant would be—your motivations would be blended in with value… You would only do it if it made sense materially… recognition through the things that you have or the… or the money that you make, if it was something that could be expressed.”
Key Points:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Angles (Asc, MC, IC, Desc) follow same FCA rules as planets
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * If Ascendant is in FCA between 1st/2nd house:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Primary: 1st house themes (self, identity, body)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Blended: 2nd house themes (value, money, possessions)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Motivations become tied to material recognition
________________


EXAMPLE 4: Venus Transitioning Through FCA
Scenario Analysis:
“If it was say venus right and venus’s influence in your second house would be strictly for value making money having possessions. Once it starts hitting up at like one degree, five arc minutes, it is now affecting your physical body. It is affecting what you look like. It is affecting. It is affecting your actions and your motivations because it’s within that energy.”
Breakdown:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Venus at 6° (2nd house): Strictly value/money/possessions
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Venus at 1°5’ (FCA entering 1st): NOW affects physical body, appearance, actions
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Reason: “Because it’s within that energy”
Conjunction Through FCA:
“This obviously is a conjunction that goes through both. And like I said before, this affects your physical body, right? Because it’s sitting at one degree. This person is going to have additional Mars traits, which wouldn’t normally show because Mars is not in the first house.”
________________


PART 8: PARTICIPANT CHART READINGS
PARTICIPANT A: CARLY (Chiron/North Node at 29° - 8th/9th House)
Chart Details:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Chiron: 29° (8th house) - IN FCA
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * North Node: Conjunct Chiron, also in FCA
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * South Node: Likely opposite in 2nd house
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Blending: 8th house (trauma, intimacy, shared resources) + 9th house (philosophy, expansion, teaching)
Initial Question:
“So, my question is, if the north node was in that cusp, you’d have to look at the moon as well? Because it’s derived off the moon? No.”
Clarification:
“When you assess the north node, you do have to assess it with the moon in terms of not how it’s linked to the moon, but as like a math equation. Your north node does not work without your moon placement… So whenever you’re looking at where your north node sits and factoring everything in, you also have to look at your moon because you’re not going to do anything without your moon.”
Follow-up:
“So with both the North Node and Chiron, in that fusion cusp, it would go both ways, both houses? Yes.”
Complete Interpretation (Verbatim):
“When you have Chiron here, Chiron, the weaknesses with it, the insecurities that come with Chiron but also the authenticity that comes with it are sitting on the border of your eighth house and your ninth house. So, what does that mean for you? It means that the things that didn’t go so great— let’s talk about trauma, since that’s your book. Yeah. The traumas that have happened in your book, and obviously, the eighth house means a whole bunch of things, but the traumas that have happened in your life are mixed in with aggression, expansion on aggression, which means it becomes big, heated arguments, big issues over authority, and uh, and long-lasting, uh, huge. Oh my god. Right.”
Comparison to Non-FCA Placement:
“And this is the difference between Chiron sitting two degrees earlier. Right. And Chiron sitting at 29.”
Detailed Breakdown:
“Chiron sits at 29. So it’s definitely eighth house. The insecurities are definitely eighth house related, but they’re also ninth house related because that energy is spilling in. It’s just coming from the lens of the eighth house. So it’s affecting that ninth house. And it’s part of that ninth house, which means Chiron’s ruler is not just, because it’s in the fusion gospel area, it’s not just Neptune, but it’s also Mars. All of this is sitting here in your fourth house of subconscious trauma. It’s sitting down here when it comes to family, when it comes to your mother, especially when it comes to culture and your own culture, the way that you see culture.”
North Node Addition:
“With the North Node, though, it’s connecting that energy back in and putting an extra emphasis for you in that ninth house energy where Saturn, Vesta, all this other stuff is, Fama. And it’s saying that, you know, within the first decan of Aries, it’s saying that this energy is hard for you to be comfortable with, hard for you to grasp most of your life. It takes you out of your comfort zone. It literally opposes your default settings. Which means there’s more of a, I know this is happening. I know it’s likely going to continue, but I don’t know why it’s happening. I don’t know how to stop it. Yeah. Because it’s sitting in opposition over here.”
Life Validation:
“But it says that the North node, you know, through this, and remember it’s Chiron, then the North node in the order. It’s saying that the North Node is to feed your insecurities, to feed your authenticity, to feed what you’ve experienced in that way into what you’re supposed to grow into emotionally. In terms of spiritual growth. Yes. And that is Ninth House Energy.”
Participant Feedback:
“The one comment that you made to me that really helped me between the eighth and ninth house was that the ninth house was my life story. That made a difference. Yeah. Hugely. Yeah.”
Technical Summary:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Primary Rulers: Neptune (8th house Pisces), Mars (9th house Aries)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Both Active: Trauma themes PLUS expansion/philosophy/teaching
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Order Matters: Chiron → North Node (feed insecurity into growth)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Real-Life Manifestation: “Big, heated arguments, big issues over authority… huge”
________________


PARTICIPANT B: ANITA (Moon 0°01’ - 12th House FCA)
Chart Details:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Moon: 0°01’ (12th house) - IN FCA (transitioning into 11th)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Nemesis: Near Moon (asteroid of self-sabotage)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Nessus: Also in proximity
Initial Question:
“Uh nemesis moon i have my moon i have my moon uh zero zero one twelfth house would that be why i don’t know what i’m feeling sometimes because there’s an element of detachment from it yes anita can i pull up your chart yeah go ahead.”
Interpretation:
“So you have that semi-sextile to the ascendant so how you feel about things and your security… I mean well first off the 12th house can be very much like I don’t know what I’m feeling. Yeah, but then you might write it off. You’d be like, I don’t know what I’m feeling, whatever. Yeah, that’s the 11th house coming in. It’s like, I want to know what I’m feeling. I’m feeling some kind of way. I feel sensitive about something, especially, you know, interacting with certain other people.”
Nemesis Retrograde Effect:
“Nemesis doesn’t have a… Yay! First off, it’s retrograde. Yeah. That’s already a tough one because nemesis is where you are your own worst enemy… but also when it’s retrograde it’s like you not only are you your own worst enemy but you do it where no one knows you’re your own worst enemy.”
Combined Effect:
“Especially since you’re basically taking nemesis and nessus energy and feeding it slightly into your moon placement as well, which can create a situation where you end up not processing your emotion and not letting go of things you should let go of.”
Key Themes:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * 12th House (Primary): Subconscious, hidden emotions, “I don’t know what I’m feeling”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * 11th House (Blended via FCA): Groups, detachment, “whatever” attitude
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Result: Emotional confusion + social detachment + self-sabotage internalized
Technical Note:
 Moon at 0°01’ is exactly at cusp but in FCA range (0-1.5°), so blending applies.
________________


PARTICIPANT C: Retrograde Mercury in 7th House at 29°
Hypothetical Question:
“My only question at the moment is like a retrograde like what if, like, let’s just say that someone has like a mercury retrograde in the seventh house, but it’s at 29 degrees. Is it like reverse to where it’s like taking something from the eighth house and then it’s moving down into the seventh?”
Answer:
“No, you’re still going to read it exactly the same, but you’re going to apply on the planet level. You’re going to apply the properties of the retrograde. Okay. So you’re blending eighth house energy in, but then it’s blending into Mercury. Mercury’s retrograde. The eighth house isn’t retrograde. Okay, that makes sense. Yeah, so you just read it the same except when you get to the retrograde of Mercury, you’re just like, okay, well, all of that from trauma, from shared resources is now working inward through logical processes or whatever the delegate is. Does that make sense? Yeah, that makes sense. Okay, cool. That was a good question.”
Key Principle:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * FCA applies normally (blend 7th and 8th house themes)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Retrograde applies to planet (internalization, reflection, compounding)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * NOT reversed direction (doesn’t “pull from 8th into 7th”)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Integration: 8th house themes (trauma, shared resources) → Mercury retrograde (internal processing, communication turned inward)
________________

Theme: Self-expression tied to material recognition

Career Manifestation:
“Somebody who has a 29… degree when they do things their career themselves you might see a career somebody with a career um ironically we talk about how funny it is that they say leo risings all have their bankers right but this might actually be one.”

8th/9th House Cusp (Trauma/Expansion)
Theme: Deep transformation blended with teaching/philosophy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Trauma (8th) becomes amplified through expansion (9th)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * “Big, heated arguments, big issues over authority”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Insecurity feeds into spiritual growth journey
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Life story IS the trauma expansion

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * “I don’t know what I’m feeling, whatever”

PART 10: PLANET-BY-PLANET CONSIDERATIONS
Mars (Action/Drive)
Standard Placement:
“Mars in the first house which is also aries energy”
FCA Effect:
 When Mars enters FCA into 2nd house:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Actions become tied to value/money
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Drive for material security intensifies
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Physical assertion connects to self-worth
________________


Venus (Value/Relationships)
Transition Example:
“If it was say venus right and venus’s influence in your second house would be strictly for value making money having possessions. Once it starts hitting up at like one degree, five arc minutes, it is now affecting your physical body. It is affecting what you look like.”
FCA Makes Venus About:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Physical appearance (if entering 1st from 2nd)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Material self-expression becomes embodied
________________


Chiron (Wound/Authenticity)
Carly’s Placement:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * 29° in 8th house (FCA into 9th)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Primary Ruler: Neptune (Pisces/8th)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Secondary Ruler: Mars (Aries/9th)

“Chiron’s ruler is not just, because it’s in the fusion gospel area, it’s not just Neptune, but it’s also Mars.”

North/South Node (Karmic Axis)
Special Consideration:
“When you assess the north node, you do have to assess it with the moon in terms of not how it’s linked to the moon, but as like a math equation. Your north node does not work without your moon placement.”
FCA Application:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Nodes in FCA blend both house themes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Growth direction (North) incorporates both areas
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Must still reference Moon for full interpretation

Asteroids (Nemesis, Nessus, etc.)
Nemesis Retrograde Example:
“Nemesis doesn’t have a… First off, it’s retrograde… That’s already a tough one because nemesis is where you are your own worst enemy… but also when it’s retrograde it’s like you not only are you your own worst enemy but you do it where no one knows you’re your own worst enemy.”
FCA Effect:
 If Nemesis is in FCA, self-sabotage themes blend between adjacent houses.

PART 11: INTEGRATION WITH ALCHEMISTIC PRINCIPLES
PHSR Cycle (Planet-House-Sign-Ruler)
Core Teaching:
“That’s why I created that order. I said there’s a difference between saying Pluto’s energy feeding into the moon versus the moon feeding into Pluto… Planet-House-Sign-Ruler. Like you have to break it down like that.”
Application to FCA:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1. Planet: Identify core planetary energy
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2. House: Determine primary house (by cusp line)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          3. Sign: Assess sign modification
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          4. Ruler: Find primary ruler
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          5. FCA Addition: If in FCA, add secondary house/sign/ruler
Sequential Processing:
“Layer it one layer at a time. Figure out what this means before you move on.”
________________


Delegates and Energy Flow
Delegation in FCA:
“Because of it being a delegate, it is going to be encapsulating the energy of the 10th house. So it’s going to have Saturnian qualities as well. It’s going to embody the sun. It’s going to embody Chiron, the mid-heaven and Neptune as a delegate of the 10th house. And that’s all going to sit here in the first house.”
FCA Amplifies Delegation:
 When planet in FCA:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Acts as delegate for BOTH houses
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Channels energy bidirectionally
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Intensifies by “hitting multiple energies… at the same exact time”
________________


Retrograde Doctrine
Key Principle:
“You’re still going to read it exactly the same, but you’re going to apply on the planet level. You’re going to apply the properties of the retrograde.”
FCA + Retrograde:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1. Blending happens normally (FCA rules apply)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2. Retrograde modifies planet (not house or blend)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          3. Result: Blended themes express inwardly/reflectively
Example:
 Mercury retrograde at 29° in 7th house:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * 7th house (relationships) + 8th house (intimacy/trauma) blend
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Mercury retrograde: communication/thought turns inward
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Combined: Relationship issues and shared resource dynamics are processed internally through reflection
________________


Aspects and Orb Theory
OOI = Effect:
“Orb of influence equals effect.”
FCA = Rulership:
“Fusion cusp areas work with [rulerships].”
Conjunction in FCA:
“If two planets are both within the fusion cusp area… they’re also conjunct… two pulls in three and three pulls in two? Like, depending on vantage? Correct. Yes. And then obviously they also work together. Right. On top of that.”
Interpretation:
 When multiple planets conjunct in FCA:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Each planet blends both houses
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          * Planets also blend WITH each other
